sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from "react-tabs";
// __ __ Components/Helpers __ __ //


const Auth = () => {
    const [tabIndex, setTabIndex] = useState(0);

    return (
        <>
            <Tabs className="theme_tabs_wrapper" selectedIndex={tabIndex} onSelect={(index) => setTabIndex(index)}>
                <TabList className="login-butn text-center border-b flex items-center justify-center">
                    <Tab className="f-size-16 hover:bg-violet-600 font-bold login-color pb-4 relative top-px cursor-pointer">
                        Login
                    </Tab>
                    <Tab className="f-size-16 font-bold login-color ml-11 pb-4 relative top-px cursor-pointer">
                        Register
                    </Tab>
                </TabList>
                <TabPanel>
                    <Login  />
                </TabPanel>
                <TabPanel>
                    <SignUp setTabIndex={setTabIndex} />
                </TabPanel>
            </Tabs>
        </>
    )
}

export default Auth
